svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
May 20, 2023" date: "2023-05-20"
Brief loss of finalization and first inactivity leak
* Prysm’s finality issue postmortem : Valid attestations with old target checkpoint
weren’t processed optimally Delay in finalization for 4 epochs & 9 epochs (with
inactivity leak) 28 ETH in penalties & 55 ETH in missed validator revenue Block space
dropped but gas prices weren’t higher than daily highest
* Valid attestations with old target checkpoint weren’t processed optimally
Valid attestations with old target checkpoint weren’t processed optimally
* Delay in finalization for 4 epochs & 9 epochs (with inactivity leak)
Delay in finalization for 4 epochs & 9 epochs (with inactivity leak)
* 28 ETH in penalties & 55 ETH in missed validator revenue
28 ETH in penalties & 55 ETH in missed validator revenue
* Block space dropped but gas prices weren’t higher than daily highest
Block space dropped but gas prices weren’t higher than daily highest
* Ben Edgington & Superphiz: finality issue discussion (video)
Ben Edgington & Superphiz: finality issue discussion (video)
* Latest consensus layer devs call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Discussions on
PRs for Deneb, removing merge conditions, adding confirmation rule and non-expiring
Latest consensus layer devs call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
* Discussions on PRs for Deneb, removing merge conditions, adding confirmation rule
* EIP4844: Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence KZG ceremony
available with no waiting to anyone with 32 mainnet transactions
* Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence
Latest EIP4844 implementer call video . Notes from Terence
* KZG ceremony available with no waiting to anyone with 32 mainnet transactions
KZG ceremony available with no waiting to anyone with 32 mainnet transactions
* Proposal for ordering Cancun & Prague opcodes in a more coherent layout
Proposal for ordering Cancun & Prague opcodes in a more coherent layout
* Proto’s consensus.actor : interactive map of attester performance using Nimbus Era
Proto’s consensus.actor : interactive map of attester performance using Nimbus Era
* Lambda consensus client planned , to be developed in Elixir by LATAM team
Lambda consensus client planned , to be developed in Elixir by LATAM team
* Geth team brain dump on implementing light clients
Geth team brain dump on implementing light clients
* Consensus layer: Nimbus v23.5.1 : improves 3rd party validator clients/beacon node
compatibility and adds incremental pruning Prysm v4.0.4 : fix for finality issue Teku
* Nimbus v23.5.1 : improves 3rd party validator clients/beacon node compatibility and
Nimbus v23.5.1 : improves 3rd party validator clients/beacon node compatibility and
* Prysm v4.0.4 : fix for finality issue
Prysm v4.0.4 : fix for finality issue
* Teku v23.5.0 : fix for finality issue
Teku v23.5.0 : fix for finality issue
* Lido v2 live: Withdrawals; no service should have more than 22% of stake (Lido has
~33%) Staking router (allows permissionless onboarding of node operators)
* Withdrawals; no service should have more than 22% of stake (Lido has ~33%)
Withdrawals; no service should have more than 22% of stake (Lido has ~33%)
* Staking router (allows permissionless onboarding of node operators)
Staking router (allows permissionless onboarding of node operators)
* Lost validator seed phrase on Ledger had private keys generated using custom app
Lost validator seed phrase on Ledger had private keys generated using custom app
* Justin Drake: MEV burn add-on to enshrined PBS, smooth & redistribute MEV spikes
* Aztec rollup circuit proving time sped up , Nullifier Tree (used to prevent actions
being repeated) reduced from 2^254 leaves to 2^32
* EIPs: EIP7039 : Scheme-handler discovery option for wallets EIP7044 : Perpetually
valid signed voluntary exits EIP7045 : Increase max attestation inclusion slot
* EIP7039 : Scheme-handler discovery option for wallets
EIP7039 : Scheme-handler discovery option for wallets
* EIP7044 : Perpetually valid signed voluntary exits
EIP7044 : Perpetually valid signed voluntary exits
* EIP7045 : Increase max attestation inclusion slot
EIP7045 : Increase max attestation inclusion slot
* Solidity immutable variables can be initialized multiple times or left uninitialized
Solidity immutable variables can be initialized multiple times or left uninitialized
* Remix v0.33 : adds scientific notation for input, refactored WalletConnect plugin,
updated Etherscan verification plugin, generate docs from file explorer and Sol2UML
Remix v0.33 : adds scientific notation for input, refactored WalletConnect plugin,
* Foundry: Scopelint : formatter & linter for Solidity & TOML and spec generation from
tests ScopeLift Foundry template Tip: fuzz settings in inline comments
* Scopelint : formatter & linter for Solidity & TOML and spec generation from tests
Scopelint : formatter & linter for Solidity & TOML and spec generation from tests
* Tip: fuzz settings in inline comments
Tip: fuzz settings in inline comments
* VS Code Solidity plugin: language server rewrite includes code completion, go to
definition, find references, hover info; Solparse upgrades; download code & ABI from
VS Code Solidity plugin: language server rewrite includes code completion, go to
* Fundraise : Solidity contract for memecoin presales with soft/hard caps, unaudited
Fundraise : Solidity contract for memecoin presales with soft/hard caps, unaudited
* Ether deck : extensible multisig in Huff, unaudited
Ether deck : extensible multisig in Huff, unaudited
* Pyrometer : verifies Solidity functions perform as expected via showing how
Pyrometer : verifies Solidity functions perform as expected via showing how variables
* Contract diff : mainnet and layer 2 support, multifile support, split & unified
Contract diff : mainnet and layer 2 support, multifile support, split & unified modes
* Next.js app router + TypeScript + ConnectKit Sign in with Ethereum example
Next.js app router + TypeScript + ConnectKit Sign in with Ethereum example
* CTFs: Curta Last One Standing solution Dragonfly CTF solution
* Base Camp : contract development guide for beginners using Remix & deploying to Base
Base Camp : contract development guide for beginners using Remix & deploying to Base
* Visa: experiments with ERC4337 account abstraction on Goerli testnet
* Pimlico ERC20 paymaster for ERC4337 account abstraction live on mainnet, Arbitrum &
Pimlico ERC20 paymaster for ERC4337 account abstraction live on mainnet, Arbitrum &
* DeFiReturns v2 launches with actual returns, with or without rewards, for ~10 major
DeFiReturns v2 launches with actual returns, with or without rewards, for ~10 major
* Solidity team need a highly skilled Developer Advocate
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth.
* Ledger’s planned KYC’d account recovery leads to a furious blowback during which
they admit that a malicious firmware update can steal your crypto despite prior
Ledger’s planned KYC’d account recovery leads to a furious blowback during which they
admit that a malicious firmware update can steal your crypto despite prior assurances
* Argentina suspending custodial crypto accounts as a result of IMF deal
Argentina suspending custodial crypto accounts as a result of IMF deal
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
* Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
Aug 28-30 – Science of Blockchain Conference (Stanford University)
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
